00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.IO;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 using Niry.Network;
00029 using Niry.GUI.Gtk2;
00030 
00031 using NyFolder;
00032 using NyFolder.GUI;
00033 using NyFolder.Utils;
00034 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00035 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00036 using NyFolder.PluginLib;
00037 
00038 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.ImagePreview {
00040     public class ImagePreview : Plugin {
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PUBLIC Const
00043         // ============================================
00044         public const int ThumbWidth = 100;
00045         public const int ThumbHeight = 52;
00046 
00047         // ============================================
00048         // PRIVATE Members
00049         // ============================================
00050         private NotebookViewer notebookViewer = null;
00051         private INyFolder nyFolder = null;
00052 
00053         // ============================================
00054         // PUBLIC Constructors
00055         // ============================================
00057         public ImagePreview() {
00058             // Initialize Plugin Info
00059             this.pluginInfo = new Info();
00060         }
00061 
00062         // ============================================
00063         // PUBLIC Methods
00064         // ============================================
00066         public override void Initialize (INyFolder iNyFolder) {
00067             this.nyFolder = iNyFolder;
00068 
00069             // Initialize GUI Events
00070             this.nyFolder.MainWindowStarted += new BlankEventHandler(OnMainWindowStarted);
00071 
00072             // Initialize Protocol Events
00073             CmdManager.AddProtocolEvent += new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnAddProtocolCmds);
00074             CmdManager.DelProtocolEvent += new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnDelProtocolCmds);
00075         }
00076 
00078         public override void Uninitialize() {
00079         }
00080 
00081         public void RequestImage (UserInfo userInfo, string filePath) {
00082             // Get Peer From UserInfo
00083             PeerSocket peer = P2PManager.KnownPeers[userInfo] as PeerSocket;
00084             if (peer != null) {
00085                 // Generate Xml Request
00086                 XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00087                 xmlRequest.FirstTag = "get";
00088                 xmlRequest.BodyText = filePath;
00089                 xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "imgthumb");
00090                 peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00091             } else {
00092                 LoadImage(userInfo, filePath);
00093             }
00094         }
00095 
00096         public void SendImageThumb (UserInfo userInfo, string filePath) {
00097             PeerSocket peer = P2PManager.KnownPeers[userInfo] as PeerSocket;
00098             if (peer != null) SendImageThumb(peer, filePath);
00099         }
00100 
00101         public void SendImageThumb (PeerSocket peer, string filePath) {
00102             string imgThumb = GenerateImageThumb(filePath);
00103             if (imgThumb == null) return;
00104 
00105             // Generate Xml Request
00106             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00107             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "snd";
00108             xmlRequest.BodyText = imgThumb;
00109             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "imgthumb");
00110             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("path", filePath);
00111             peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00112         }
00113 
00114         public string GenerateImageThumb (string path) {
00115             try {
00116                 path = GenerateRealImagePath(path);
00117                 Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf = ImageUtils.GetPixbuf(path, ThumbWidth, ThumbHeight);
00118                 byte[] imgData = pixbuf.SaveToBuffer("png");
00119                 return(Convert.ToBase64String(imgData));
00120             } catch (Exception e) {
00121                 Debug.Log("Generate Img Thumb: {0}", e.Message);
00122                 return(null);
00123             }
00124         }
00125 
00126         // ============================================
00127         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00128         // ============================================
00129         private void OnMainWindowStarted (object sender) {
00130             // Initialize GUI Components
00131             InitializeMenu();
00132 
00133             // Initialize Notebook Viewer Events
00134             notebookViewer = this.nyFolder.MainWindow.NotebookViewer;
00135             notebookViewer.FileAdded += new ObjectEventHandler(OnFileAdded);
00136         }
00137 
00138         private void OnAddProtocolCmds (P2PManager p2pManager) {
00139             CmdManager.GetEvent += new ProtocolHandler(OnGetEvent);
00140             CmdManager.SndEvent += new ProtocolHandler(OnSndEvent);
00141         }
00142 
00143         private void OnDelProtocolCmds (P2PManager p2pManager) {
00144             CmdManager.GetEvent -= new ProtocolHandler(OnGetEvent);
00145             CmdManager.SndEvent -= new ProtocolHandler(OnSndEvent);
00146         }
00147 
00148         protected void OnFileAdded (object sender, object storeIter) {
00149             FolderViewer folderViewer = sender as FolderViewer;
00150             Gtk.TreeIter iter = (Gtk.TreeIter) storeIter;
00151             FolderStore store = folderViewer.Store;
00152 
00153             // Request Image Thumb if it's Image
00154             string filePath = store.GetFilePath(iter);
00155             if (ImageUtils.IsImage(Path.GetExtension(filePath)) == true) {
00156                 RequestImage(folderViewer.UserInfo, filePath);
00157             }
00158         }
00159 
00160         public void OnGetEvent (PeerSocket peer, XmlRequest xml) {
00161             if (xml.Attributes["what"].Equals("imgthumb")) {
00162                 SendImageThumb(peer, xml.BodyText);
00163             }
00164         }
00165 
00166         public void OnSndEvent (PeerSocket peer, XmlRequest xml) {
00167             if (xml.Attributes["what"].Equals("imgthumb")) {
00168                 string path = (string) xml.Attributes["path"];
00169                 ReceiveImageThumb((UserInfo) peer.Info, path, xml.BodyText);
00170             }
00171         }
00172 
00173         protected void OnImagePreview (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00174             Gtk.ToggleAction action = sender as Gtk.ToggleAction;
00175 
00176             if (action.Active == true) {
00177                 this.notebookViewer.FileAdded += new ObjectEventHandler(OnFileAdded);
00178             } else {
00179                 this.notebookViewer.FileAdded -= new ObjectEventHandler(OnFileAdded);
00180             }
00181         }
00182 
00183         // ============================================
00184         // PRIVATE Methods
00185         // ============================================
00186         private void InitializeMenu() {
00187             ToggleActionEntry[] entries = new ToggleActionEntry[] {
00188                 new ToggleActionEntry("ImagePreview", null, "Image Preview", null,
00189                                       null, new EventHandler(OnImagePreview), true)
00190             };
00191 
00192             
00193             string ui = "<ui>" +
00194                         "  <menubar name='MenuBar'>" +
00195                         "    <menu action='ToolMenu'>" +
00196                         "      <menuitem action='ImagePreview' position='top' />" +
00197                         "    </menu>" +
00198                         "  </menubar>" +
00199                         "</ui>";
00200 
00201             nyFolder.MainWindow.Menu.AddMenus(ui, entries);
00202         }
00203 
00204         private string GenerateRealImagePath (string imagePath) {
00205             return(Paths.UserSharedDirectory(MyInfo.Name) + imagePath);
00206         }
00207 
00208         private void ReceiveImageThumb (UserInfo userInfo, string path, string b64image) {
00209             try {
00210                 byte[] imgData = Convert.FromBase64String(b64image);
00211                 Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(imgData);
00212                 LoadImage(userInfo, path, pixbuf);
00213             } catch (Exception e) {
00214                 Debug.Log("Load {0} Image {1}: {2}", userInfo.Name, path, e.Message);
00215             }
00216         }
00217 
00218         private void LoadImage (UserInfo userInfo, string path) {
00219             try {
00220                 Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf = ImageUtils.GetPixbuf(path, ThumbWidth, ThumbHeight);
00221                 LoadImage(userInfo, path, pixbuf);
00222             } catch (Exception e) {
00223                 Debug.Log("Load {0} Image {1}: {2}", userInfo.Name, path, e.Message);
00224             }
00225         }
00226 
00227         private void LoadImage (UserInfo userInfo, string path, Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf) {
00228             // Lookup File Iter
00229             FolderViewer folderViewer = notebookViewer.LookupPage(userInfo);
00230             if (folderViewer == null) return;
00231 
00232             // Get File Tree Iter
00233             Gtk.TreeIter iter = folderViewer.Store.GetIter(path);
00234             if (iter.Equals(Gtk.TreeIter.Zero)) return;
00235 
00236             // Build & Set Thumb Image
00237             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00238                 folderViewer.Store.SetPixbuf(iter, pixbuf);
00239                 folderViewer.ShowAll();
00240             });
00241         }
00242 
00243         // ============================================
00244         // PUBLIC Properties
00245         // ============================================
00246     }
00247 }
